title: The magical maths of pool testing
description: Tim Harford speaks to Israeli researcher, Tomer Hertz, about how the mathematical magic of pool testing could help countries to ramp up their Covid-19 testing capacity.
itunes:subtitle: Could pool testing hold the key to ramping up Covid-19 testing?
itunes:summary: Tim Harford speaks to Israeli researcher, Tomer Hertz, about how the mathematical magic of pool testing could help countries to ramp up their Covid-19 testing capacity.
itunes:author: BBC Radio 4
